@usedefaults

{{cssstyle
    table{
        width: 125% !important;
        max-width: 125%;
    }
}}

h3. CPU Statistics
{{stat key:n$$id.system.cpu.percent title=CPUPercent areaMode=stacked Max=100}}
{{stat key:n$$id.system.cpu.time.system,n$$id.system.cpu.time.user,n$$id.system.cpu.time.iowait,n$$id.system.cpu.time.idle title=CPU%%20Time graphType=pie}}

h3. Memory Statistics
{{stat key:n$$id.system.memory.percent areaMode=stacked}}

h3. Network Statistics

{{stat key:n$$id.system.network.kbytes.recv,n$$id.system.network.kbytes.send title=KBytes}}
{{stat key:n$$id.system.network.packets.recv,n$$id.system.network.packets.send title=Packets}}
{{stat key:n$$id.system.network.drop.in,n$$id.system.network.drop.out title=Drop}}
{{stat key:n$$id.system.network.error.in,n$$id.system.network.error.out title=Error}}
